original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.OwnerUserId = ph.UserId AND ph.UserId = b.UserId AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=3 AND p.Score>=-7 AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=117
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 3
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 117)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -7
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3E4.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
